name: poochfriendly
description: A pet-caring application that matches pet caretakers to pet owners.

scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend-testing && npm run build && cd ../frontend/frontend && npm run build
scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend-testing && npm ci && cd ../frontend/frontend && npm ci
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend

author: Rayson Koh
